body:
Welcome back to another Plug.DJ session. This week's theme will be EDM ( Electronic Dance Music) Themed.

When is it?
EST: 6:00 PM (Friday June 12th 2015)
PST: 3:00 PM (Friday June 12th 2015)
GMT: 10:00PM (Friday June 12th 2015)
AEST: 9:00 AM (Saturday June 13th 2015)

There is no specific end time.

I have a profile. Now what?
You can start a pre-party, maybe tell a few friends to come along and have a good time!
Remember that the link is:
https://plug.dj/avicus


I don't have an account :c
If this is your first time ever using plug.dj, you will need to sign up. Go to their page here:

https://plug.dj/dashboard you also can register at https://plug.dj/avicus

Follow the instructions to create a profile.
Keep in mind that once you create a username, you cannot change it in the future, so do not impersonate others.

https://plug.dj/avicus

Once you "plug" into the hangout (haha), create a playlist of songs by searching up your favourites on YouTube or use Soundcloud playlists, and then join the wait list! Once it's your turn to DJ, everyone in the hangout can dance, listen, and have a good time to your song!

Cool. Any rules?
Basic behavior rules apply. Don't be rude to others in chat, try to limit the amount of inappropriate language you use in the chat. Any person found doing this will receive a warning.

Basic video rules apply. Don't down vote (meh) every song, max video time 10 minutes, do not play anything in the recent history.Please do not play any videos that may contain gory/sexual/racist/homophobic/violent content. Any person found playing such content will receive a warning, followed by a ban.

Have fun!

Also any suggestion for themes would be great!

title: PlugDJ Friday! EDM Night!

replies.body: Party will be starting very soon! Join now for the pre party!
replies.body_tagged: Party will be starting very soon! Join now for the pre party!
